metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9939 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
ihex.c in GNU Binutils before 2.26 contains a stack buffer overflow when printing bad bytes in Intel Hex objects.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 7.99.90.20170502-0ubuntu1
gdb-multiarch - 7.99.90.20170502-0ubuntu1
gdb-source - 7.99.90.20170502-0ubuntu1
gdbserver - 7.99.90.20170502-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue is trapped by fortify source

criterions.comment: gdb package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.99.90.20170502-0ubuntu1').
